00049 Patter::Patter(char * aFile) {
00050   fileName = aFile;
00051   size = 0;
00052 
00053   interArray = NULL;
00054   patty = NULL;
00055 }

00060 Patter::Patter(double aCheckPoint, int anOffset, char * aFile) {
00061   fileName = aFile;
00062   size = 0;
00063 
00064   interArray = NULL;
00065   patty = NULL;
00066   this->checkPoint = aCheckPoint;
00067   this->offset = anOffset;
00068 }

00072 Patter::Patter() {
00073   
00074   /* Just setup */
00075   size = 0;
00076   offset = 0;
00077   origin = 0;
00078   interArray = NULL;
00079   patty = NULL;

00091 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00092 void Patter::clear() {
00093   if(size != 0) size = 0;
00094   if(interArray != NULL) delete interArray;
00095   if(patty != NULL) delete patty;
00096 }

00100 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00101 void Patter::Nursery(int anOrigin) {
00102   int fileLength;
00103   char * method;
00104 
00105   this->origin = anOrigin;
00106 
00107   DataIn PN; PN.ReadDummies();
00108   PN.ReadInts(1);                   // length of the PAT file
00109   fileLength = PN.intVect[0];
00110   PN.ReadChars(1);                  // method(s) used
00111   method = PN.nameOf[0];
00112 
00113   while(strcmp(method, "End_Nursery") != 0) {
00114     cout << "method: " << method << " origin=" << origin << endl;
00115 
00116     if (strcmp(method, "INIT_PAT") == 0) {
00117       Patter::InitPat();
00118     } else if (strcmp(method, "INIT_PROB") == 0) {
00119       Patter::InitProb();
00120     } else if (strcmp(method, "SIMPLE") == 0) {
00121       Patter::SimplePat();
00122     } else if (strcmp(method, "EXPAND") == 0) {
00123       Patter::Expand();
00124     } else if (strcmp(method, "ADJUST") == 0) {
00125       Patter::Adjust();
00126     } else if (strcmp(method, "RECORD") == 0) {
00127       Patter::Recorder(fileLength);
00128     } else {
00129       cout << "Patter::Nursery - no method available" << endl;
00130       cin >> sever;
00131     }
00132 
00133     PN.ReadChars(1);
00134     method = PN.nameOf[0];
00135   }
00136 //cout << "Patter:: Nursery - END" << endl;
00137   Patter::Recorder(fileLength);             // write pattern in PAT
00138 }

00142 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00143 void Patter::Nursery(std::list<FileValue> args) {
00144   int size;
00145   int *data;  
00146   const char * method;
00147 
00148 
00149   std::list<FileValue>::const_iterator it;
00150   for(it=args.begin(); it != args.end();++it) {
00151     std::list<FileValue> method_args = (*it).getList();
00152     std::list<FileValue>::const_iterator it2;
00153     it2=method_args.begin();
00154     method = (*it2).getString().c_str();
00155 
00156     if (strcmp(method, "INIT_PAT") == 0) {
00157       //Build the data array and size from the data provided.
00158       ++it2;  //get the next item from the iterator
00159       std::list<FileValue> data_list = (*it2).getList();
00160       size = data_list.size();
00161       data = new int[size+1];
00162       int i = 0;
00163       std::list<FileValue>::const_iterator data_it;
00164       for(data_it=data_list.begin();data_it != data_list.end();++data_it) {
00165     data[i] = (int) (*data_it).getNumber();   //FileValue's only have double precision numbers, so cast this to integer.
00166     i++;    
00167       }
00168       Patter::InitPat(size, data);
00169     } else if (strcmp(method, "INIT_PROB") == 0) {
00170       Patter::InitProb();
00171     } else if (strcmp(method, "SIMPLE") == 0) {
00172       Patter::SimplePat();
00173     } else if (strcmp(method, "EXPAND") == 0) {
00174       std::list<FileValue> data_list = (*it2).getList();
00175       Patter::Expand(data_list);
00176     } else if (strcmp(method, "ADJUST") == 0) {
00177       Patter::Adjust();
00178     } else {
00179       cout << "Patter::Nursery - no method available" << endl;
00180       cin >> sever;
00181     }
00182 
00183   }
00184 }

00190 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00191 void Patter::InitPat() {
00192 
00193   DataIn Ip;
00194 
00195   Ip.ReadInts(1);                       // size of interval pattern
00196   size = Ip.intVect[0];
00197   Ip.GenInts(size);                     // read interval pattern
00198 
00199   interArray = new int[size+1];         // create value pattern
00200   patty = new int[size+1];
00201 
00202   for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {       // copy intervals into an array
00203     interArray[i] = Ip.gIntVect[i];
00204     patty[i] = 0;                       // make sure patty is empty
00205   }
00206 
00207   patty[size] = 0;
00208 }
00209 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00210 
00211 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00212 void Patter::InitPat(int data_size, int *data) {
00213 
00214   size = data_size;
00215   interArray = new int[size+1];                 //create value pattern
00216   patty = new int[size+1];
00217 
00218   for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {               //copy intervals into an array
00219     interArray[i] = data[i];
00220     patty[i] = 0;                               //make sure patty is empty
00221   }
00222 
00223   patty[size] = 0;
00224 }

00228 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00229 void Patter::SimplePat() {
00230   patty[0] = origin;
00231 //cout << "Patter::SimplePat - origin=" << origin << endl;
00232 
00233   for(int location = 0; location <= size; location++) {
00234     //use current patty element as origin for next interval
00235     if(location != size) {
00236       patty[location + 1] = patty[location] + interArray[location];
00237     }
00238 //  cout << "Patty::SimplePat - patty[" << location << "]=" << patty[location]
00239 //   << " origin=" << origin << endl;
00240   }
00241 }

00265 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00266 void Patter::Expand() {
00267   char * method;
00268   
00269   DataIn Ex;
00270   Ex.ReadChars(1);
00271   method = Ex.nameOf[0];
00272 
00273   while(strcmp(method, "End_Expand") != 0) {
00274 
00275     if(strcmp(method, "EQUIVALENCE") == 0) {
00276       Patter::Equivalence();
00277     } else if(strcmp(method, "SYMMETRIES") == 0) {
00278       Patter::Symmetries();
00279     } else if(strcmp(method, "DISTORT") == 0) {
00280       Patter::Distort();
00281     } else {
00282       cout << "Patter::Expand - no method available" << endl;
00283       cin >> sever;
00284     }
00285 
00286     Ex.ReadChars(1);
00287     method = Ex.nameOf[0];
00288   }
00289 
00290 }

00295 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00296 void Patter::Expand(std::list<FileValue> args) {
00297   const char * method;
00298   int modulo, low, high;
00299 
00300   std::list<FileValue>::const_iterator it;
00301   for(it=args.begin(); it != args.end();++it) {
00302     std::list<FileValue> method_args = (*it).getList();
00303     std::list<FileValue>::const_iterator it2;
00304     it2=method_args.begin();
00305     method = (*it2).getString().c_str();
00306     modulo = (int) (*++it2).getNumber(); 
00307     low = (int) (*++it2).getNumber(); 
00308     high = (int) (*++it2).getNumber(); 
00309 
00310     if(strcmp(method, "EQUIVALENCE") == 0) {
00311       Patter::Equivalence(modulo,low,high);
00312     } else if(strcmp(method, "SYMMETRIES") == 0) {
00313       Patter::Symmetries(modulo,low,high);
00314     } else if(strcmp(method, "DISTORT") == 0) {
00315       Patter::Distort(modulo,low,high);
00316     } else {
00317       cout << "Patter::Expand - no method available" << endl;
00318       cin >> sever;
00319     }
00320 
00321   }
00322 
00323 }

00331 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00332 
00333 void Patter::Equivalence() {
00334 
00335   int low, high, modulo, newElement, numTerms, pointNum;
00336   int sign = -1;
00337 
00338   DataIn eq;
00339   eq.ReadInts(3);
00340   modulo = eq.intVect[0];           // interval of repeat
00341   low = eq.intVect[1];              // lower limit
00342   high = eq.intVect[2];             // higher limit
00343 
00344   // how many more terms are possible within range/
00345   // careful here, do not change: integers. Also: modulo can not be <= 0.
00346   if(modulo <= 0) {
00347     numTerms = 1;
00348   } else {
00349     numTerms = (high - origin) / modulo + 1 + (origin - low) / modulo;
00350   }
00351 
00352   // create two more arrays now that we know their cardinal
00353   int points[numTerms];
00354   double probs[numTerms];
00355 
00356   for(int location = 0; location <= size; location++) { 
00357     pointNum = 0;                           // loc. in points array
00358  
00359     for(int i = 0; i < numTerms; i++) {     // make sure they are empty
00360       points[i] = 0;
00361       probs[i] = 0;
00362     }
00363     
00364     for(int j = 0; j < numTerms; j++) {     // for each possible equivalence
00365 
00366       for(int k = 0; k < 2; k++) {          // generate + - new elements
00367         newElement = origin + modulo * j * sign;
00368 
00369         if(j != 0 || k != 1) {              // only one origin!
00370 
00371           if(Patter::CheckRange(low, high, newElement)) {
00372             points[pointNum] = newElement;
00373 
00374             // assign probabilities according to distance from origin
00375             probs[pointNum] = (double)(numTerms - j) / (double)numTerms;
00376             pointNum++;
00377           }
00378         }
00379         sign *= -1;
00380       }
00381     }
00382 
00383     // load _value_ array patty
00384     CumulArray(probs, numTerms);            // utility functions
00385     // choose one
00386     patty[location] = points[Random::ChooseFromProb(probs, numTerms)];
00387 
00388     // use current patty element as origin for next interval
00389     if(location != size) origin = patty[location] + interArray[location];
00390   }
00391 }
00392 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00394 
00395 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00396 void Patter::Equivalence(int modulo, int low, int high) {
00397 
00398   int newElement, numTerms, pointNum;
00399   int sign = -1;
00400 
00401   //how many more terms are possible within range/
00402   //careful here, do not change: integers. Also: modulo can not be <= 0.
00403   if(modulo <= 0) {
00404     numTerms = 1;
00405   } else {
00406     numTerms = (high - origin) / modulo + 1 + (origin - low) / modulo;
00407   }
00408 
00409   //create two more arrays now that we know their cardinal
00410   int points[numTerms];
00411   double probs[numTerms];
00412 
00413   for(int location = 0; location <= size; location++) {
00414     pointNum = 0;                               //loc. in points array
00415 
00416     for(int i = 0; i < numTerms; i++) {         //make sure they are empty
00417       points[i] = 0;
00418       probs[i] = 0;
00419     }
00420 
00421     for(int j = 0; j < numTerms; j++) {         //for each possible equivalence
00422 
00423       for(int k = 0; k < 2; k++) {              //generate + - new elements
00424         newElement = origin + modulo * j * sign;
00425 
00426         if(j != 0 || k != 1) {                  //only one origin !
00427 
00428           if(Patter::CheckRange(low, high, newElement)) {
00429             points[pointNum] = newElement;
00430 
00431             //assign probabilities according to distance from origin
00432             probs[pointNum] = (double)(numTerms - j) / (double)numTerms;
00433             pointNum++;
00434           }
00435         }
00436         sign *= -1;
00437       }
00438     }
00439 
00440     //load _value_ array patty
00441     CumulArray(probs, numTerms);                        //utility functions
00442     patty[location] = points[Random::ChooseFromProb(probs, numTerms)];          //choose one
00443 
00444     //use current patty element as origin for next interval
00445     if(location != size) origin = patty[location] + interArray[location];
00446   }
00447 }

00507 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00508 bool Patter::CheckRange(int low, int high, int element) {
00509   
00510   return (low <= element && element <= high);
00511 }

00515 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00516 int Patter::Chooser(double checkPoint, int offset) {
00517   int value;
00518   char * method;
00519 
00520   DataIn PC;
00521   PC.ReadChars(1);
00522   method = PC.nameOf[0];
00523 
00524   while(strcmp(method, "End_Chooser") != 0) {
00525     //  cout << "method: " << method << endl;
00526 
00527     if (strcmp(method, "IN_ORDER") == 0) {  // according to objNum or type
00528       value = patty[offset];
00529     } else if (strcmp(method, "OTHER") == 0) {
00530     //    ValuePick; 
00531     //    ChooseFromList; 
00532     //    SimpleIrand
00533     } else if (strcmp(method, "TYPE_CLUSTERS") == 0) {      // sochos FUNCS
00534       value = (int)ReadComputeFloat(checkPoint, offset);
00535     } else if (strcmp(method, "TIME_DEPEND") == 0) {        // tone-row
00536         //    value = Patter::TimeDepend(checkPoint);
00537     } else if (strcmp(method, "PROBABILITY") == 0) {
00538         //    value =
00539     } else {
00540       cout << "Patter::Delivery - no method available" << endl;
00541       cin >> sever;
00542     }
00543 
00544     PC.ReadChars(1);
00545     method = PC.nameOf[0];
00546   }
00547 
00548   return value;
00549 }

00553 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00554 int Patter::Delivery(double checkPoint, int offset) {
00555   int value;
00556   char * method;
00557 
00558   DataIn PD; PD.ReadDummies();
00559   PD.ReadChars(1);
00560   method = PD.nameOf[0];
00561 
00562   while(strcmp(method, "End_Delivery") != 0) {
00563 //  cout << "method: " << method << endl;
00564 
00565     if (strcmp(method, "GET_PATTY") == 0) {
00566       Patter::GetPatty();
00567     } else if (strcmp(method, "ADJUST") == 0) {
00568       Patter::Adjust();
00569     } else if (strcmp(method, "CHOOSER") == 0) {
00570       value = Patter::Chooser(checkPoint, offset);
00571     } else {
00572       cout << "Patter::Delivery - no method available" << endl;
00573       cin >> sever;
00574     }
00575 
00576     PD.ReadChars(1);
00577     method = PD.nameOf[0];
00578   }
00579 //cout << "Patter::Delivery - value=" << value << endl;
00580 //cin >> sever;
00581   return value;
00582 }

00586 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00587 void Patter::GetPatty() {
00588 
00589   DataIn dg; dg.ReadDummies();
00590   dg.ReadInts(1);
00591   dg.Skip(dg.intVect[0] - 1);               // skip filesize
00592 
00593   dg.ReadInts(1);
00594   size = dg.intVect[0];
00595   dg.GenInts(size+1);
00596 
00597   if(patty == NULL) patty = new int[size+1];
00598 
00599   cout << "Patter::GetPatty - patty:"; 
00600   for(int i = 0; i <= size; i++) {
00601     patty[i] = dg.gIntVect[i];
00602     cout << patty[i] << "  "; 
00603   }
00604   cout << endl;
00605 }

00609 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00610 void Patter::Recorder(int fileLength) {
00611   char ** buffer;
00612 
00613   cout << "Patter::Recorder - fileName: " << fileName << endl;
00614   DataIn Pr;
00615   Pr.rewindFile(0);
00616 
00617   buffer = new char * [fileLength];
00618 
00619   for(int i = 0; i < fileLength; i++) { 
00620     buffer[i] = new char [80];
00621     Pr.ReadBuffer();
00622    
00623     for(int j = 0; j < 80; j++) {
00624       buffer[i][j] = Pr.buffer[j];
00625     }
00626   }
00627 
00628   ofstream patOut(fileName,ios::out);       // open the same file as out
00629 
00630   for(int i = 0; i < fileLength; i++) {
00631     patOut << buffer[i] << "\n";
00632   }
00633 
00634   patOut << "\npatty        " << size << "  ";
00635 
00636   for(int i = 0; i <= size; i++) {          // write new info
00637     patOut << patty[i] << "  ";
00638   } 
00639   patOut << endl;
00640 
00641   patOut.close();                           // close output file
00642 
00643   for(int i = 0; i < fileLength; i++) { 
00644     delete [] (char*) buffer[i];
00645   }
00646   delete [] (char**) buffer;
00647 }
00648 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00649 std::list<int> Patter::getPattern(void) {
00650     std::list<int> l;
00651     int i;
00652     for(i=0;i<=size;i++) {
00653         l.push_back(patty[i]);
00654     }
00655 
00656     return l;
00657 }
